- **Player 5**: Claimed to be the Witch, didn't save Player 6 last night, believed Player 4 is pretending to be the Seer, called for votes against Player 4. Player 5 received my accusation as Player 4 (werewolf) and chose to claim Witch, indicating Player 5 is the real Witch.
- **Player 7**: Claimed to be the Witch, didn't save Player 6 last night, believed Player 5 is a werewolf pretending to be the Witch, supported Player 4, will protect Player 7 tonight, called for votes against Player 5.
- **Player 8**: Claimed to be a villager, couldn't define Player 6's identity, didn't support Player 4, thought Player 4 could be the Seer or a werewolf, believed one of Player 5 and 7 is a werewolf and the other is the Witch. As all three special roles have been claimed, Player 8 can only be a villager.
- **Player 9**: Claimed to be a villager, believed Player 5 is the real Witch, thought Players 4 and 7 are both werewolves, couldn't judge Player 8's identity, supported the Seer in the later speaking order. As all three special roles have been claimed, Player 9 can only be a villager.
- **Player 1**: Claimed to be the Guard, protected himself last night, believed one of Player 5 and 7 is the real Witch and the other is a werewolf, thought Player 4 is a werewolf pretending to be the Seer, supported the Seer in the later speaking order. Player 1 claimed to be the Guard; if he were a villager, there's no reason to falsely claim this role and confuse the good team, so Player 1 must be the real Guard.
- **Player 2**: Claimed to be the Seer, declared Player 4 as bad identity, believed Player 5 is the Witch, Player 7 is a werewolf pretending to be the Witch, thought Player 9 is good, believed Player 1 is the Guard, will check Player 8 tonight, called for votes against Player 4. Player 2 and I (Player 4) both claimed to be the Seer. If Player 2 were a villager, there's no reason to accuse an earlier player who claimed to be the Seer, so Player 2 must be the real Seer.
- **Player 3**: Claimed to be a villager, believed Player 7 is a werewolf pretending to be the Witch, supported Player 2, thought Player 4 is a werewolf pretending to be the Seer, called for votes against Player 4, believed Player 5 is the real Witch, suggested the Witch use the poison on Player 7 tonight. As all three special roles have been claimed, Player 3 can only be a villager.
